ThingDef.description:
A fleece jacket and combat pants in multicam pattern.
Has velcro patches for optional morale patches, running around in fleece under hot conditions can be impractical but for the sake of looking tactical as frick, who cares?
ThingDef.label: combat fleece

ThingDef.description:
A fleece jacket and combat pants in multicam pattern.
Has velcro patches for optional morale patches, running around in fleece under hot conditions can be impractical but for the sake of looking tactical as frick, who cares?
ThingDef.label: combat fleece black

ThingDef.description:
The Gorka uniform manufactured by the Russian company BARS is one of the many derivatives of the famous Soviet gorka suit.
The suit is designed to be loose fitting and is windproof and waterproof.
ThingDef.label: GORKA 4

ThingDef.description:
A combat uniform, field uniform, or battledress, is a type of uniform used in combat, as opposed to dress uniforms worn in functions and parades. In American English, the term fatigues is often used, originally being a term for soldiers' work uniforms.
The combat uniform is generally camouflaged, either in monochrome such as a shade of green or brown to approximate the background, or in a disruptive pattern.
ThingDef.label: combat uniform Olive

ThingDef.description:
A standard tan T-Shirt and combat trousers, or if you're a female commando that dual wields pistols that enjoys blowing things up with C4 and yelling one-liners, a tube tank top with trousers that highlight your femininity.
"Shake it Baby!"
ThingDef.label: combats Red Alert

ThingDef.description:
An explorer outfit perfect for being out and about in survival situations within tropical jungles.
Protip: Do not drink your own urine.
ThingDef.label: tank explorer blue

ThingDef.description:
An explorer outfit perfect for being out and about in survival situations within tropical jungles.
Protip: Do not drink your own urine.
ThingDef.label: tank explorer red

ThingDef.description: A gym outfit good for excercising and keeping the wearer cool.
ThingDef.label: casuals gym outfit

ThingDef.description:
The Russian telnyashka is an undershirt horizontally striped in white and various colors and which may be sleeveless. It is an iconic uniform garment worn by the Russian Navy, the Russian Airborne Troops (VDV) and the Russian marines.
Dating back to the 19th century Tsarist Navy, it was subsequently worn by the Soviet successors of these troops.
ThingDef.label: tank Telnyashka

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking combat shirt with buttons. Perfect for occasions where you are forced into a battle royale with other contestants to the death.
ThingDef.label: combat shirt gray

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking combat shirt with buttons. Perfect for occasions where you are forced into a battle royale with other contestants to the death.
ThingDef.label: combat shirt navy

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking collar shirt with buttons and a necktie. Perfect for survivors who just got off the office to fight the apocalypse.
ThingDef.label: casuals Louis

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking collar shirt with buttons and a necktie. Perfect for off-duty officers (not necessarily from Brazil) that are trying to mind their own business until bad guys show up.
ThingDef.label: casuals Valentine

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking collar shirt with buttons and a necktie. Perfect for students or other fancy people, shaken not stirred.
ThingDef.label: formal spy

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking collar shirt with buttons and a necktie. Perfect for professionals.
ThingDef.label: formal professional

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking shirt and a set of combat trousers in Desert DPM camo. Perfect for occasions where you are forced into a battle royale with other contestants to the death.
ThingDef.label: combats DDPM

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking shirt with a logo of the sun setting in a tropical island. Perfect for survivors in a world running out of humans due to an outbreak.
ThingDef.label: casuals Ellie

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking red shirt and a set of brown cargo pants. Perfect for operators taking down cartel operations in wildlands.
ThingDef.label: casuals Nomad

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking hoodie and jeans. Perfect for Division agents taking down factions in an overrun city.
ThingDef.label: casuals Division

ThingDef.description:
A nice-looking tactical polo and a set of blue jeans. Has the Warrior Poet Society patch.
"Warrior Poets are those who are lovers of truth and lovers of people, and they are defenders of both. They are lions and lambs. Warriors and poets. The warrior poet is someone of deep conviction, careful thought, and skill in violence." - John Lovell
ThingDef.label: casuals Warrior Poet

ThingDef.description:
A nice-looking tactical shirt and a set of blue jeans. Perfect for being convinced by a recruiter to join the army based on Camaros and Dodge Chargers, only to end up with Uncle Sam saying "I got 'cho ass now".
But Sarge!
ThingDef.label: casuals But Sarge

ThingDef.description: A nice-looking formal attire in red. Perfect for agents that pretend to be the FBI or whatever in a zombie apocalyptic scenario.
ThingDef.label: formal agent
